item.description: I don’t want to achieve immortality through my work; I want to achieve immortality through not dying. I don’t want to live on in the hearts of my countrymen; I want to live on in my apartment.

item.title: A Study Revealed People Who Skydive Regularly Often Die in Other Accidents or Become Drug Addicts
item.description: A Study Revealed People Who Skydive Regularly Often Die in Other Accidents or Become Drug Addicts [[Pleasure without Pursuit is Terrible for Our Health]]

item.title: Dragon Story
item.description: Dragon Story A [[Dragon]] takes a few people from a civilization every year. This happens for several centuries. One day, they realize that their technology is good enough to kill the [[Dragon]], and they do it.

item.title: I Don't Want to Achieve Immortality Through My Work. I Want to Achieve it Through Not Dying.
item.description: I Don’t Want to Achieve Immortality Through My Work. I Want to Achieve it Through Not Dying. [[Woody Allen]]
